sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF ( PKB ) is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Monday, with over 476,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 54,000.
Shares of PKB were up about 0.8% on the day.
Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Monday were Home Depot ( HD ), trading up about 1.4% with over 1.8 million shares changing hands so far this session, and D.R.
Horton ( DHI ), up about 0.2% on volume of over 1.5 million shares.

Terex ( TEX ) is the component faring the best Monday, up by about 3% on the day, while Cavco Industries ( CVCO ) is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF, trading lower by about 0.5%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
